data:
I’ve been a programmer for 4 years now. Over that time I’ve had the chance to work at some great companies Including CompareTheMarket.com (current) and Philips.

 As a developer I challenge myself and learn new things. At university my passion for learning allowed me to achieve a First, But after university I’ve worked hard to keep learning and developing.

As well as learning for myself I’m keen to feed back and share what I have learned with others. I have a blog on medium which has CompareTheMarket.com’s most read article . And recently taught React at a Codebar event in london.
